question: What is my responsibility from shariath point of view, in this situation of Iraq, to make myself free of sin in the eyes of Allah? I am in Saudia.
answer:
QUESTION
Shall I stop working with British, Canadians etc? Shall I resign and go in Jamath for long time. If I do so, will it be the right thing to do in this time of fitan. Please tell me what to do to make my self satisfy that I have responded rightly to this situation
ANSWER


Share:
There will be no sin upon yourself to work/deal with non-Muslims. This can rather be used as a means of inviting them towards Islam by showing them the true Islamic way of dealings, business transactions, truthfulness, honesty, etc.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
